title: Texas’ Blue-State Deployments Shred Relations Between Governors
summary: State leaders have prided themselves on finding bipartisan consensus, but President Trump’s deployment of National Guard troops from Texas to Illinois has ripped the veneer off that image.

summary: California wildfires have become particularly devastating in recent decades, but their origins vary.

summary: Critics initially panned it, but public love for the musical with songs like “One Day More” and “On My Own” has kept it going strong for four decades — and counting.

summary: Young people in Nepal rose up against corruption and inequality. But they say they did not expect the bloodshed, arson and government downfall that followed.
